p: Preclinical evidence. This herbal medicine has been experimentally proven for asthma. Studies in animals and in vitro models have demonstrated multiple biological properties of honokiol, including anti-asthma (through IL4 and IFN-NF-kB) ( Hong et al., 2018). Other related symptom studies are anti-histamine ( Shin et al., 2001) and anti-HIV (human immunodeficiency viruses) activities ( Amblard et al., 2006).
